verses.verse: Let <S%G5399>us<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G1860>haply<s%>, a promise being <S%G2641>left<s%> of <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%>, <S%G5100>any<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> should <S%G1380>seem<s%> to have come short of <S%G5302>it<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>indeed<s%> we have <S%G2070>had<s%> good tidings <S%G2097>preached<s%> unto <S%G2509>us<s%>, even as also <S%G2548>they<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G189>hearing<s%> <S%G5623>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5623>profit<s%> <S%G1565>them<s%>, because it was <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4786>united<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> with them that <S%G191>heard<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1525>we<s%> who have <S%G4100>believed<s%> do <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that <S%G2663>rest<s%>; even <S%G2531>as<s%> he hath <S%G2046>said<s%>, <S%G5613>As<s%> I <S%G3660>sware<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>, <S%G1487><s%> They shall not <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%>: <S%G2543>although<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> were <S%G1096>finished<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he hath <S%G2046>said<s%> <S%G4225>somewhere<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> day on this <S%G3779>wise<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2664>rested<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>;

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it <S%G620>remaineth<s%> that <S%G5100>some<s%> should <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G846>thereinto<s%>, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they to whom the good tidings <S%G2097>were<s%> <S%G4386>before<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G3756>failed<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1525>in<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G543>disobedience<s%>,

he <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G3724>defineth<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G4594>To-day<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> so <S%G5118>long<s%> a <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3326>afterward<s%> (even <S%G2531>as<s%> hath been <S%G2046>said<s%> <S%G4594>before<s%>), To-day <S%G1437>if<s%> ye shall <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G4645>Harden<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2424>Joshua<s%> had <S%G2664>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2664>rest<s%>, <S%G302><s%> <S%G2980>he<s%> would <S%G3756>not<s%> have spoken2980, Deuteronomy23 <S%G3326>afterward<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.
There <S%G620>remaineth<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> a sabbath <S%G4520>rest<s%> for the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> that is <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%> hath <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2664>rested<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> his <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%>.

Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2443>rest<s%>, <S%G3361>that<s%> no <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1722>after<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5262>example<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2198>living<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1756>active<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5114>sharper<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1366>two-edged<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%>, and <S%G1338>piercing<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> the <S%G3311>dividing<s%> <S%G5037>of<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, of <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G719>joints<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3452>marrow<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> quick to <S%G2924>discern<s%> the <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1771>intents<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>.

And <S%G2076>there<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%> that is not <S%G852>manifest<s%> <S%G1799>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1799>sight<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1131>naked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> laid <S%G5136>open<s%> before the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2254>have<s%> to <S%G3056>do<s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%>, who hath passed <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, let us hold <S%G2902>fast<s%> our <S%G3671>confession<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1410>that<s%> <S%G3361>cannot<s%> be touched with the <S%G4834>feeling<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> one that hath <S%G3985>been<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>points<s%> tempted3985, 3987 <S%G2596>like<s%> <S%G3665>as<s%> we <S%G5565>are<s%>, yet without <S%G266>sin<s%>.

Let <S%G4334>us<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G3326>near<s%> with <S%G3954>boldness<s%> unto the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> may <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to <S%G996>help<s%> us in time <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G2121>need<s%>.
